name: Coffee Break Inc
description:
Coffee Break INC. is a game made for a game jam. The goal is to survive. You survive by not going bankrupt.

You need to refill your beans and brew coffee to serve to your customers. The bean prices will vary every day and go up depending on how far you've come. Every day the price will alter, up or down. The customer amount will also change every day and is dependent on the price of a cup of coffee. You can determine what price the coffee will be. 

Be strategic about your choices and try to manage your business for as many days as you can! Have fun!
